00029 #ifndef LBANN_BASE_HPP
00030 #define LBANN_BASE_HPP
00031 
00032 #include "datatype.hpp"
00033 #include "El.hpp"
00034 
00035 typedef float DataType; // if you change this, also update DataTypeMPI
00036 static MPI_Datatype DataTypeMPI = MPI_FLOAT;
00037 
00038 typedef El::Grid EGrid;
00039 typedef El::Grid Grid;
00040 typedef El::Matrix<DataType> Mat;
00041 typedef El::AbstractDistMatrix<DataType> AbsDistMat;
00042 typedef El::DistMatrix<DataType> DistMat;
00043 typedef El::DistMatrix<DataType, El::CIRC, El::CIRC> CircMat;
00044 typedef El::DistMatrix<DataType, El::STAR, El::STAR> StarMat;
00045 typedef El::DistMatrix<DataType, El::MR, El::STAR> ColSumMat; /* Summary matrix over columns */
00046 typedef El::DistMatrix<DataType, El::STAR, El::VC> StarVCMat;
00047 typedef El::BlockMatrix<DataType> BlockMat;
00048 typedef El::ElementalMatrix<DataType> ElMat;
00049 
00051 enum class matrix_format {MC_MR, CIRC_CIRC, STAR_STAR, STAR_VC};
00052 
00054 enum class execution_mode {training, validation, testing, prediction, invalid};
00055 
00057 enum class weight_initialization {zero, uniform, normal, glorot_normal, glorot_uniform, he_normal, he_uniform};
00058 
00060 enum class pool_mode {max, average, average_no_pad};
